Test Name: FH Full Gene Analysis for Hereditary Leiomyomatosis and Renal Cell Cancer Syndrome (HLRCC)
Specimen Type: DNA extracted from peripheral blood, saliva, or tissue
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants in the FH gene to aid in the diagnosis and management of Hereditary Leiomyomatosis and Renal Cell Cancer Syndrome (HLRCC).
Container: Labeled microcentrifuge tube containing purified DNA
Equipment: NGS library preparation kit, thermocycler, validated NGS sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), automated NGS data analysis software, capillary electrophoresis system
